# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="808a1-102">Réponse dans Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="808a1-103">Pour répondre à un message à la fois:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-104">Dans votre liste de messages, choisissez le message auquel vous souhaitez répondre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-105">En haut à droite du volet de message, sélectionnez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="808a1-106">**Répondre** ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="808a1-107">**Répondre à tous**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-108">Tapez votre message, puis sélectionnez **Envoyer**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="808a1-109">Pour répondre automatiquement à tous les messages:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-110">Accédez à</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="808a1-111">**Paramètres** > **Afficher tous les paramètres** > Outlook**réponses automatiques** du**courrier électronique** > pour ouvrir vos [paramètres de réponses automatiques](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-112">Sélectionnez le bouton **activer les réponses automatiques** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-113">L’activation de la case à cocher **Envoyer des réponses uniquement pendant une période** vous permet d’effectuer les opérations suivantes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="808a1-114">Envoyer uniquement les réponses lorsque vous le souhaitez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="808a1-115">Si vous ne définissez pas de période, votre réponse automatique reste active jusqu’à ce que vous la désactiviez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="808a1-116">Bloquer votre calendrier</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="808a1-117">Refuser automatiquement les nouvelles invitations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="808a1-118">Refuser et annuler mes réunions pendant cette période</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-119">Dans la zone de message, tapez un message à envoyer aux personnes pendant que vous êtes en déplacement.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-120">Pour envoyer uniquement les réponses à vos contacts, activez la case à cocher **Envoyer uniquement les réponses aux contacts** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="808a1-121">Cliquez sur **Enregistrer**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="808a1-122">En savoir plus sur le [transfert automatique dans Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="808a1-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
